sites.compiledCss: body, .markdown-body {font-family: "Titillium Web" !important;}code, .blob-code, .blob-num {font-family: "Jetbrains Mono"!important; font-weight: 300!important;}h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, b, strong {font-weight: 700!important;}
body, table, tr, td, span, a, .title, .commtext, .hnuser, .age, .subtext, .athing, .pagetop, .hnname {font-family: "Titillium Web" !important;}.title {font-weight: 600!important;}
